name: Darcy's Yurt Adventure
description:
"Darcy's Yurt Adventure" is a tiny game made in a few days as a Christmas present to my sister, Darcy, who just moved into a yurt.

This game is a series of inside family jokes. If you haven't actually met me, my sister, our family, or her partner, you're going to have a bad time. Otherwise, you may have a good time.

A fullscreen Windows build of the game is also available for download.
